title: Scrummy carrot and courgette soup
ingredients: ['30g butter', '3 small onions', '7 medium carrots, peeled and chopped', '2 courgettes, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 pint of chicken or vegetable stock', '1 or 2 glugs of Worcestershire sauce', 'smoked paprika to taste', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', 'freshly chopped fresh herbs or a pinch of dried mixed herbs', 'salt and pepper to season']
